methods.name: photos.getById
methods.description: Returns information about photos by their IDs.

parameters.name: photos
parameters.description: IDs separated with a comma, that are IDs of users who posted photos and IDs of photos themselves with an underscore character between such IDs. To get information about a photo in the group album, you shall specify group ID instead of user ID. Example:; "1_129207899,6492_135055734, ; -20629724_271945303"

parameters.name: photo_sizes
parameters.description: '1' — to return photo sizes in a
